skills.skill: High School Diploma or GED equivalent
Enrollment in or completion of a CADAC program
Valid Driver's License and Reliable Car

duties_responsibilities.duty: Help adults with problems with substance use with finding their own unique pathways to recovery.
Mentoring and empowering their peers to be in the ‘driver seat’ of their lives.
Completing Recovery Coach trainings and supervision with BHN to become certified in Recovery Coaching.
Connect weekly with recoverees via phone, zoom, or in-person in their home communities.
Assisting recoverees with access to basic needs like safe housing, food, benefits, transportation, healthcare.
Link individuals to substance use and mental health treatment and to preferred recovery communities and resources.
Serve as guides and peer mentors in the day-to-day journey of personal and family recovery.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent (required)
Enrollment in or completion of a CADAC program (preferred)
